text:
[Verse]
Stars shine above us
Endless night we see
Wish upon a comet
Dreamers we'll always be

[Verse 2]
Planets spinning round
In our cosmic wake
Travel through the sound
Together we won't break

[Chorus]
In this galaxy of dreams
Everything's as it seems
Floating through time and space
Endless love we embrace

[Verse 3]
Black holes and wonders
Mysteries in the sky
Feel the magic thunder
Let our spirits fly

[Verse 4]
Through the Milky Way
Hand in hand we'll go
Find our brighter day
Love will always grow

[Chorus]
In this galaxy of dreams
Everything's as it seems
Floating through time and space
Endless love we embrace
title: Galaxy of Dreams
